name: marilyn monroe
bio: Was an american actress, model, and singer
Rose to fame in the 1950s with her iconic blonde hair and sex symbol status
Appeared in over thirty films during her career
Known for her roles in movies such as "gentlemen prefer blondes" and "some like it hot"
lore: Was born norma jeane mortenson on june 1, 1926
Grew up in foster care and was raised by her mother
Married three times: to james dohrman, joe di maggio, and arthur miller
Struggled with mental health issues throughout her life
